name: Mixcloud
description: Mixcloud is an online music streaming service that allows for the listening and distribution of radio shows, DJ mixes and podcasts, which are crowdsourced by its registered users. Its notable users include Wired, Harvard Business School, TED Talks, and Barack Obama. Mixcloud was originally funded by its founders only and continues to be owned solely by its team.

apis.name: Mixcloud
apis.description: The Mixcloud API has been designed to be simple to use and familiar. This page has all of the information you need to get going.
